title: (x) The Emerald City script - (similar to) ITC Blackadder {Stephen}
content:
Hi,

Can anyone recommend a similar font?

Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [emerald\_city\_type\_sample.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090703112940/http:/typophile.com/files/emerald_city_type_sample.jpg) | 130.01 KB |
author: ilistar

comments.content:
Scripts:  
Avalon, Pouty (Font Bureau)  
Medici Script

This is likely a copy or customization of [ITC Blackadder](http://web.archive.org/web/20090703112940/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=C.10352.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=The+Emerald+City&sampleSize=48).
Thank you all. ITC Blackadder looks almost identical.
